name: You Are Not The Hero
description: A new action platform RPG, inspired by all the people the heroes always ended up screwing over. Stupid heroes...

recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel速 Pentium速 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 300 MB available space
